(434)       Extracts with Explanatory Notes on the 
                 Training of Medical Students. 
                                             (Sept. 1907) 


     In all the instruction given through the Spirit of Prophecy regarding the training of medical students, the necessity of spiritual consecration and of faithfulness in Bible study is constantly emphasized. The students are directed to search the Scriptures, and to establish themselves thoroughly on all phases of the third angel's message.
